revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.thecus.com/product.php?PROD_ID=1 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Thecus |model = N2100 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS, NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;80219;FW80219M600; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 600 <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;JS28F128J3D75; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5DU561622ETP-D43; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8110SB; |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8110SB; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:14:FD
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RedBoot |stockos = Linux;;2.6.9;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB 2.0, SATA |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 9-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = fan, RTC w/ battery backup |addchip = 2-port PCI SATA Controller;Silicon Image;Sil3512;;1; ,,, 4-port USB 2.0 Host Controller;VIA;VT6212L;;1; ,,, I2C Real Time Clock;Richoh;RS5C372A;;1; ,,, Hardware Monitor IC;Fintek;F75375S;;1; ,,, Serial EEPROM;unknown;93CC46;;2; ,,, 16-bit I2C-bus LED dimmer;Phillips;PCA9532PW;;1; ,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3243C;;1; ,,, Dual PWM Controller with DDR Option;Intersil;ISL6539;;1; ,,, 5A Low dropout linear regulator;Anpec;APL5912;;1; ,,, Field programmable clock synthesizer;IDT;ICS345R;;1; ,,, DDR Termination Regulator;National Semiconductor;LP2994;;1;,,, Programmable High Density PLD;Lattice Semiconductor;LC4064V;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.100 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, DietPC, OpenBSD
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B001J54B64 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== RAM is via DDR DIMM socket which can be upgraded to a 512MB DIMM.
===Models=== <small> *'''Thecus N2100''': @600MHz IOP CPU, 2x SATA, DDR RAM, 3x USB 2.0, 2x GbE LAN, miniPCI. :This device is also sold by [[Allnet ALL6500]] and [[Evesham SilverSTOR M-Box]]. *'''IO-Data GLAN Tank''': @400MHz IOP CPU, 2x IDE, 128MB RAM, 4x USB 2.0, 1x GbE LAN. :Other devices from IO-Data: HDL-Gxxx, HDL-GWxxx, and HDL-GZxxx series, are very similar. *'''Intel SS4000-E''': @400MHz IOP CPU, 4x SATA, 256MB RAM (exp.), 2x USB 2.0, 2x GbE LAN. :Intel (Baxter Creek) SS4000-E design by Lanner, NAS appliances NS04-4100 and NS04-4110. </small>
==Links of Interest== <!-- *[http://naswebsite.com/wiki/Products ''NAS Website''] XXX --> *[http://thecus.nas-central.org/wiki/Category:N2100 ''NAS Central'' Wiki] *[http://www.cyrius.com/debian/iop/n2100/install.html ''Installing Debian'' Wiki]
==See also== *[[Intel Entry Storage System SS4000-E]] - 4-bay NAS :CPU: [[Intel XScale]] 80219 @400MHz
